segments.text: Excuse me , I ’ Ve been waiting here for fifteen minutes.Do you know why the traffic is so heavy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A lorry overturned on the road and blocked it , so all the traffic was held up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , what a terrible situation ! This traffic is unbearable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , traffic was brought to a standstill by the accident . If we had gone early we would miss the traffic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree with you . But now we have to wait . The sky is overcast , and it is very sultry . I fear a thunder storm is brewing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . The traffic jam is said to be over soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I hope so . Thank you for telling me this .
segments.speaker: S1
